website_summaries.verdict: This charging pad comes in several sophisticated marbled finishes. It is, however, a little finicky about phone placement.
pros: Choice of colors and patterns, including several sophisticated marbled designs
Equipped to quick-charge select later iPhone models
cons: May not charge if phones are not well centered on pad

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 7 Months
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great to charge two phones at once and alignment wasn't an issue like other chargers. The charger stopped working and after 3 emails so far I haven't been contacted by the manufacturer to replace it since it has a 1 year warranty. No matter how good a product is, its CRAP if they won't stand behind it. Note: I have emailed them from both of my accounts and have checked all spam folders and junk mail folders.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Haiko

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have an android and an iPhone. This didn't work properly. It took awhile to find a good position for it to (sometimes) charge it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: When using Mophie wireless battery cases...
customer_reviews.text: You will need to move your phone to the L&R outside edges of the platform for charging to commence (unlike the positioning they picture).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it works with your case.
customer_reviews.text: It only comes in 3 hideous colors and it won't work with my phone case because the case has 6 magnets imbedded in the leather.
customer_reviews.author: mark2theb

customer_reviews.title: Problem Maker
customer_reviews.text: Very irate. Misread the return by date. Can't return a product that doesn't work nor is it a fast charger or marble. It's marble print. Doesn't even charger what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Paul

customer_reviews.title: Picky!
customer_reviews.text: The product does charge your phone but is VERY picky where you place your phone and won’t charge through a silicone case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Likes the price and features, however one side stopped working after 9 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: 2 cell phone charger
customer_reviews.text: doa right out of the box.i think the power supply does not work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the first few days
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few nights and then no longer worked unless another phone was also on, after using had trouble getting belatedly to charge
customer_reviews.author: User1234

customer_reviews.title: VERY compact.
customer_reviews.text: Never used, returned it. Was too small for my taste but was cute!
customer_reviews.author: Guela47

customer_reviews.title: It's working but has a constant buzz noise
customer_reviews.text: tried to put this on my nightstand but it has a constant buzz noise. Its so annoying so I had to move it to living room for charging my phones.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Yang

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This wireless Charger gives me trouble When is charging my iPhone X
customer_reviews.author: JOSE GUZMAN

customer_reviews.title: Positioning is difficult, no indicators.
customer_reviews.text: You must position your phone correctly almost immediately, otherwise it does not charge. It you move the phone during charging (gets bumped) it will stop charging. Not a good characteristic for a multi phone charger. It does not charge through thin cases, you have to take them off. Returning mine, not very useful and too difficult to use -Samsung S7 Active-
customer_reviews.author: Adam Halfhill

customer_reviews.title: Hit and Miss
customer_reviews.text: Charges sometimes & sometimes it doesn't. You have to fiddle with the position of you phone if you have a thicker case. Can't really expect a lot for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Air

customer_reviews.title: You can only charge one phone at a time.
customer_reviews.text: It will charge the Galaxy S9, but it’s slow to charge. You can’t charge two phones at once, it’s spotty, you have to find the right spot in order for your phone to start charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fast Wireless Charger, ZVE Qi Certified Dual Wireless Charger Charging Pad [AC Adapter Included] for iPhone X, iPhone 8/8 Plus,Samsung Galaxy S9/ S9+/ S8 / S8+/ S7 S7 Edge Note 8 - Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackZVE Dual Wireless Charge Pad

Compatible with ALL Qi-Enable Phones

Works with Apple iphone X, iphone 8, iphone 8 Plus and all Qi compatible smartphones 

including the Samsung Galaxy S8, S8+, Note 8

Wireless Charging Devices Compatibility List:

-Apple iPhone 8 / iPhone 8 Plus / iPhone X

-Samsung Galaxy S9 S9+ S8 S8+ S7 S6 edge edge+ S4 S5 NOTE 3 4 5

-Nokia lumia 920 925 928 929 930 950 820 822 830 850 720 735 1020 1520 BH-220

-HTC Droid DNA (US version) Rzound Butterfly (US version) 8X 8XT Incredible 4G LTE M8

-Sony Xperia Z2 Z3V Z4V Hike X1 G2 G3 G Pro AS870 SH-13C Grand S EXT Geek

-Google Nexus 4 5 6 7

-LG E960 D1L

-Phillips X723

-BlackBerry Z30

-Moto 360 Droid 5 LTE2

-SHARP SH-07D/ SH-04D/ SH-02D

-TCL Hero N3

-Other Qi-Enable smartphones / devices

Product Specification:

Size: 188*103*13mm

Packing Size: 290*107*56mm

Net Weight: 403g

Gross Weight: 600g

QI standard : WPC Qi Ver.1.2 (BPP* / EPP*)

Input Voltage : AC 4.5-12

Input Current : 3A(Max)

Output Power : 5W/7.5W/10W

Standby Power Consumption : ＜0.05W

Wireless Charge Rate : 85%

Operating Temperature (Charging/Discharge) : -5-45℃

Storage Time : ≥64months

Storage Humidity : ≤75%RH

Packing List:

1 X Double Wireless Charging Pad

1 X AC/DC Adapter(36W)

1X User Manual

1 X Customer Service Card

Note:

Make sure that your device is compatible with wireless charging function and read user 

Manual carefully before using. 

Warranty:

This ZVE Dual Wireless Charge Pad is Warranted for 6 months from date of purchase 

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us!
feature_bullets: 【Compatible with ALL Qi-Enable Phones】Works with Apple iphone X, iphone 8, iphone 8 Plus and all Qi compatible smartphones including the Samsung Galaxy S8, S8+, Note 8

【Charge 2 Phone at the Same Time】 Built-in 4 quality coils offer 2 larger charging area for two Phone that you can charge two Phone at the same. It also has over temperature protection, low-temperature holding when charging , not harm to your phone.
【Built-in Thermo Protection】A temperature sensor was built-in. Over Temperature Protection, low-temperature holding When Charging , not harm to your phoneprotected from heat damage.

【Support for Fast Charge】Come with 9V/4 A AC Adapter, Fast Charge Model(with 7.5 W Output) for iphone x, iphone 8, iphone 8 Plus (IOS 11.2 or above) and all QI-Enable android Phones. Regular Speed Charge Model(5 W Output) for iPhone 8, iPhone 8 PLus, iPhone X (IOS 11.1 or below ).

【What you Get】1 * Double Wireless Charging Pad, 1 * AC/DC Adapter(36W), 1* User Manual, 1 * Customer Service Card and our 30-days Money Back Guarantee, Effortless 180-days Free Warranty, Lifetime Technical Support.
